author: Odeinoichus
title: Ready for Battle, without a weapon???
review:
Set #71023 Battle-Ready Lucy: No longer using her Master Builder identity. Lucy has a very impressive looking print with a lot of great detailing and some dual-moulded legs.

Lucy includes a new head piece with goggles. She comes with a pair of light grey binoculars, a black quiver and a dual-sided face with a smiling happy expression and a frowning prepared for anything expression. Curiously despite having a quiver she does not include any type of bow, I don't believe she used one in the movie, but it might have been nice to include it here, perhaps in a new colour to represent Lucy's unique style choice of hot blue and pink. She also does not include any alternate hair piece.

Compared with Emmet I would say Lucy here is a more interesting looking figure. Definitely higher up on my Recommended list. Her printing is top-notch, her accessories work well, and she's definitely a nice variant to own. I just wish she also had a bow of some kind to go with that quiver. Just to complete the look. Recommended.
